name: Ninja Rally: The Will of Fire
name_original: Ninja Rally: The Will of Fire
description:
[Hundred Ninjas Assembly Against the Shinobi Crisis]
[Ninja Rally: The Will of Fire] is a Naruto act & SLG card game that brings you back to those epic ninja battles. The core gameplay is to collect and develop all those classic ninjas in Naruto. Over a hundred ninjas rally here to help you reach the top of the ninja world.Build the strongest ninja team and fight along with your heroes!

[Ninja Assembly Against the Shinobi Crisis]
Legendary ninjas including Jiraiya [Sage], Uchiha Madara, Uzumaki Naruto [Kurama], and so on are at your disposal. Assembly your ninjas to participate in the 5V5 ninjutsu battle!

[Ninja Trial With Bountiful Resources]
Participate in the ninja trial every day to obtain tons of resources including copper coins, exp, rare ninjas, and so on. Overflowed resources greatly speed up your training!

[Tame Tailed Beasts to Crush Your Enemies]
Countless tailed beasts including Kurama, Gyūki, and so on are waiting for you. Tame them to bomb your enemies with tailed beast balls!

[Join the Guild Battle to Fight Together for the Peak]
Join guild and participate in the guild battle to vie for resources and protect your allies. Live up to your Nindō for your guild and defeat rogue ninjas!
